comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: "Friedrich Ernst II Fürst zu Solms-Baruth (24.6.1853 - 31.12.1920) Prince Friedrich zu Solms-Baruth served in Kaiser Wilhelm II's entourage from 1899 to 1918 as Oberstkämmerer (High Chamberlain), the highest ranking court official in His Majesty's service. He was simultaneously attached to the Great General Staff, serving as the Imperial Commissar overseeing volunteer health care personnel in the field. Solms-Baruth was additionally a member of the Herrenhaus, Prussian House of Lords, and functioned as the Kaiser's Oberstjägermeister, Grand Master of the Hunt." home.comcast.net/~jcviser/aok/solms-baruth.htm

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: artolog:  Thanks for the additional information here.  We'll include some of it next time we update.
